channel.title: ::item for 508 doesnt work
channel.description:
when i type ::item #### (any number) nothing happens and in my run.cmd it says
[code]java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: 2 at palidino76.rs2.io.packets.commands.handlepacket(commands.java:140) at palidino76.rs2.io.packetmanager.parsepacket(packetmanager.java:149) at palidino76.rs2.io.Packets.parseincomingpackets(packets.java:102) at java.land.thread.run(Unkown Source)[/code] here is my ::item command
[code] } else if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));[/code]
